scripts.prepublish:
echo '--- Prepublishing ---
' && npm run test && npm run compile
scripts.compile: rimraf build/ && mkdir build && babel src --out-dir build  --source-maps
scripts.cover: rimraf coverage && mkdir coverage && babel-node node_modules/.bin/babel-istanbul cover --dir coverage/istanbul node_modules/.bin/nodeunit src/test/index.js
scripts.check: npm run lint && npm run test && npm run cover && npm run coveralls
scripts.concat: rimraf dist/ && mkdir dist && npm run compile && browserify build/lib/index.js -o index.js
scripts.dist: rimraf dist/ && mkdir dist && npm run compile && browserify -t uglifyify build/lib/index.js -o dist/promiseMe.min.js
scripts.clean: rimraf dist/ && rimraf coverage/ && rimraf build/
